name: Space Protektor
description:
Comrade Cosmonaut, you have been tasked to destroy the enemies of the Democratic People's Federation! Destroy the enemies and rule the universe in the name of the workers!

Use left and right arrow keys to move Glorious Federation Ship and spacebar to launch laser bolts at Glorious Federation's enemies.

[Will probably add more content; for now this is just a project for a course.]
